item.title: Alphabet Gets Price Target Boost Ahead Of Q2 Print: Retail Says ‘Google Is So Undervalued’
item.description: Guggenheim raised Alphabet’s price target to $210, citing stronger ad trends, a weaker dollar, and expected double-digit growth in Search.
